General.Name: Shanghai Kangda New Materials Co Ltd
General.Description: Kangda New Materials (Group) Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of structural adhesives and new polymer materials in the People's Republic of China. It offers modified acrylate adhesive, organic silica gel, epoxy resin, polyurethane, acrylate, SBS, PUR hot melt, water-based, and other adhesive products; and epoxy resin and polyurethane composite materials, polyimide materials, and other materials. The company's products are used in wind power generation and blade manufacturing, packaging materials, rail transit, marine engineering, automobiles, electronic appliances, mechanical equipment, architectural decoration, industrial maintenance, aerospace, photovoltaic solar energy, rubber and plastic products, construction engineering, elevators, mining equipment, and other fields. The company was formerly known as Shanghai Kangda New Materials Group Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Kangda New Materials (Group) Co., Ltd. in July 2021. Kangda New Materials (Group) Co., Ltd. was founded in 1988 and is based in Shanghai, the People's Republic of China.

4.Name: Mr. Yi Tao  Shen
